fees.description: Access wholesale energy rates with a $21.49/month membership fee.
Charged when full payment has not been received by the invoice due date. This charge is not subject to GST.
Charged when a direct debit payment has dishonoured or reversed. This charge is not subject to GST.
Charged for providing a paper bill
May be charged when you move into a property or change retailer. Actual fee may vary.
May be charged when you move out and require a final meter read. Actual fee may vary.

electricityContract.terms: Energy Locals offers no lock in contracts or exit fees. Prices may vary in accordance with the terms and conditions. See energylocals.com.au/terms for full terms and conditions.
electricityContract.variation: Due to changes in the market and economic conditions, we may update your tariff and/or fees. We will provide at least 5 business days' notice before the change takes place.

incentives.description: $50 credit on your and your friends accounts, if you sign up using a Refer a Friend link from an existing Energy Locals customer. T&Cs apply, refer to https://energylocals.com.au/terms-and-conditions-refer-a-friend. This offer can be withdrawn anytime at the discretion of Energy Locals.
